document_data.name: Huhhus
document_data.mainbody: '''Huhhus''' was the [[Red Wizard]] made famous for discovering a recipe for ''[[potion of regeneration]]'' long before the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Many years before the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, a lowly Red Wizard of [[Thay]] named Huhhus found a way to perfectly distill a [[troll]]'s flesh into a concoction that granted the imbibers the [[regenerative]] abilities of a troll. Few people were willing to drink the foul distillate despite the unarguable usefulness. Decades later, one of Huhhus's students used the Red Wizard's method and found a way to imbue a troll's regenerative abilities onto a magic [[ring]]. The secret was to fill a hollow cavity inside a [[jade]] ring with ichor and the brains of a troll.
